text: Ezɨ God mati gumazim dɨpenimɨn ingari moghɨn, a uan siosɨn ingarasa egha dɨpenir akɨnir gavgaviba akunizɨ da tugha ikia gavgafi. Egha dɨpenir akɨnir kabar a kamaghɨn osiri, “Ekiam bar uan gumazamizibagh fo.” Egha ua kamaghɨn osiri, “Gumazamizir Ekiamɨn ziam itiba, me bar arazir kuraba akɨrim ragh a dagh asaragh.”
